147376402.review:
I really loved playing through the prologue! Puzzles are good for starting to learn how the game works, but still really fun and challenging!
Graphics are really polished and pleasant to watch, and the adaptive soundtrack is really nice!
Being the prologue the story doesn't start yet, but the dialogues gave me a sense of mistery, and now I'm really looking forward to play the complete game! :D

147372568.review:
Soul's Spectrum: Awakening is a game that really captures from the first minutes and does not let go until the very end. As a fan of fantasy and role-playing games, I was pleasantly surprised by the depth and interest that this game offered me.

The stunning graphics immediately catch your eye. The world of Soul's Spectrum comes to life on the screen with incredible beauty and detail. It was like I was immersed in a real fantasy world, where every corner is begging to be explored.

The gameplay is impressive in its variety. I could choose my path and face different characters and tasks. This gives the game depth and realism, as if I really interact with the living world.

The characters and their development also deserve a special mention. I fell in love with my hero and could really customize his skills and characteristics according to my style of play.

The plot of Soul's Spectrum: Awakening is fascinating and fascinating. I felt like I was becoming part of an epic story full of mysteries and riddles. All this is accompanied by an amazing musical atmosphere that adds emotional depth to the game.

In conclusion, Soul's Spectrum: Awakening is a game that will immerse you in the world of magic, adventure and fantasy. If you, like me, adore role-playing games, then this is a must-buy. I enjoy every minute in this world, and I look forward to continuing this fascinating story!

147369693.review: The traps and puzzles in the game are so varied that I felt a strong sense of satisfaction every time I found a solution. However, not everything is so simple - there are very complex puzzles that are simply taken apart by the brain. But this is exactly what pushed me forward, and I could not stop until I found out what happened in this mysterious dungeon.

147364446.review: Soul's Spectrum: Awakening is a free prequel that turns death into progression. With each demise, Nora transforms, gaining new abilities to overcome challenges. Explore a captivating storyline, solving puzzles in various forms—Human, Skeleton, Shadow, and Soul. Encounter peculiar characters, unravel mysteries, and outsmart traps in this epic adventure. Javarnanda's 16-bit music adds to the experience. Uncover your destiny, use newfound skills, and fulfill your purpose.

147361565.review: “Soul’s Spectrum: Awakening is a captivating RPG adventure on Steam that combines amazing graphics, complex puzzles, thrilling fights, and rich character development. It has a unique blend of Eastern and Western culture, and it offers an engaging journey where your choices affect the fate of the world.”

147360274.review: This is a great game for those who love puzzles, a dark atmosphere and mysterious stories. It captivates with its depth and makes you think. At the same time, graphics and sound only enhance the atmosphere of the game. Being careful and resourceful is the key to success in this exciting game.

147355759.review:
"Soul's Spectrum: Awakening" oddly spellbound me with its blend of metaphysical philosophy and challenging gameplay. The unique narrative circles around the protagonist's spiritual awakening journey, effectively intertwining with achingly beautiful environments. Each level feels like a dream, layered with deep symbolism and challenging puzzles.

Gameplay is engaging with varied mechanics woven into the story to maintain constant intrigue. Boss battles are testing but satisfying, truly testing my strategic thinking. Dialogue is not always on point, suffering from some clunky phrasing, yet largely the narrative enchants.

Graphically, the game is a masterpiece— surreal sceneries spark unending awe, offering a visually delightful gaming experience. The ambient soundtrack complements the game's metaphysical tone well.

In essence, "Soul's Spectrum: Awakening" offers a genuinely engaging journey of self-discovery unlike anything I've encountered in the gaming world. Despite minor narrative flaws, it's a must-experience. Highly recommend for those seeking more than a conventional gaming experience.

147354745.review: A thrilling RPG with an exciting story and intriguing battles. Explore an amazing world, fight monsters, solve puzzles and develop your character. Unique skills, deep characters and exciting moments make this game an unforgettable experience for fans of fantasy adventures and strategic battles.

147353819.review: One of the advantages of the game is its well-thought-out story. Each new stage opens a new chapter in this dark story and makes you think about what is happening. I loved solving mysteries and meeting new characters who helped me understand what had happened.

147350825.review: is not just a game, it is a real work of art. I am grateful to the developers for their hard work and passion put into this project. Don't miss the chance to plunge into this amazing world!

147348421.review: The gameplay also deserves the highest praise. The controls are smooth and intuitive, allowing you to maximize your enjoyment of the gameplay. A variety of tasks and puzzles add a share of excitement and challenge to the game, without giving a moment of fatigue.

147346064.review:
Oh, finally an indie game without pixel art. Well, almost pixelated. At least everything is not as horrible as some.
We walk and wander through locations and mazes, die, get other character forms with other skills and walk and wander again. The way the game looks reminded me of the first parts of Final Fantasy, but this is absolutely not it.

147346049.review: "Soul's Spectrum: Awakening" is an exciting journey in a world where death is not the end, but a new beginning of the adventure. This free prequel game to "Soul's Spectrum" offers players a unique experience that grants new abilities with each death. You will have to reveal your potential using acquired skills to overcome various challenges and riddles waiting for you in this mysterious world. One of the most amazing features of the game is how it integrates death into gameplay. Each death becomes a step towards your progress, and new Burrow shapes with their unique abilities add depth and variety to the gaming experience. This creates a truly exciting dynamic and motivation for experimenting with different styles of play. Puzzles and riddles in the game also deserve attention. They are well balanced and integrated into the plot, requiring the player to use the unique abilities of different Burrow shapes to solve them. This adds an element of strategy and variety to the gameplay.

147345618.review: I am in awe of Soul's Spectrum: Awakening! This game is a true masterpiece, which completely absorbed me into its fascinating world from the first minutes of the game.

147340833.review:
I just finished the prologue and I really enjoyed it! So I made a second attempt to get the last achievement :)
It's a rather short game (in a good way) that introduces you to the main mechanics and offers you fair challenges with simple puzzles to get you in the game, followed by some more hard and tough ones. 
At first, it can be hard to remember that you actually have to die to progress, but once you grasp this mechanic, the games goes on smoothly. I really want to know the full story and overcome the challenges that Soul's Spectrum will throw at me, so I'll definitely play the full game once it's released!
I recommend this one to the players that like clever puzzle games mixed with exploration and a thrilling story.
Looking forward to the full game. Good job : )

147308030.review:

I'm looking forward to a full game!

147307958.review:
I discovered the micro-hidden gem, as it seemed to me, although I may be wrong, but the first impressions are extremely good.
In appearance, the game is super simple, pixelated, made in RPG-Maker, top view, as in some old dandy games, but the idea is extremely interesting
You start playing as a spirit, and you go through first simple, then intricate puzzles, and the whole intricacy lies in the fact that in fact, you were a person in a previous life, and with each lit candle with a blue flame that you meet along the way - you change your shape
Spirit->some kind of shadow shell (I didn't fully understand)->skeleton->human. There are 4 forms in total, and each has its own characteristics and disadvantages.
And imagine that there are barriers in the form of spiritual walls (through which all forms can pass, except for the spirit), light from lanterns (can pass everything except the shadow shell), spikes through which everything can pass except the skeleton (a person can dodge if the button is pressed in time), and there are special buttons that only a skeleton can squeeze by throwing a bone.
In general, it takes half an hour, but it's cool. I would even like to play the full version. Lager has passed twice since the last achievement (for the entire prologue to die less than 20 times). I recommend it!

147297610.review:
[b]It's a mix of adventure, RPG and puzzle.[/b]
You play as a ghost who can take on four different forms in order to escape the mysterious prison he finds himself in after death.

You can transform into the courageous Human, the haunting Skeleton, the elusive Umbra, and the ethereal Anima

This is an excellent title with some truly quality writing, augmenting a dark and brilliant story.

Soul's Spectrum: Awakening is an evolution of the RPG Maker game that doesn't involve grinding or cumbersome inventory management, perfect for players who want a more casual experience.

Soul's Spectrum: Awakening is a game that is exciting, inspiring and leaves an unforgettable experience. Absolutely recommend to anyone looking for an unforgettable adventure in the gaming world.

147296840.review:
Souls Spectrum Awakening is an absolute masterpiece in the world of gaming. From the moment I started playing, I was drawn into its mesmerizing universe. The graphics are nothing short of breathtaking; every inch of the game world is a work of art. The attention to detail in character design, environments, and animations is jaw-dropping.

But it's not just about the visuals; the gameplay is where this title truly shines. The combat system is fluid and exhilarating, with a vast array of abilities and combos to master. The level of challenge keeps you on your toes, and the progression system is deeply rewarding.

What sets Souls Spectrum Awakening apart is its gripping narrative. The storyline is rich and captivating, filled with intriguing characters and plot twists that kept me glued to the screen for hours on end. The voice acting and music further enhance the immersive experience.

Additionally, the game's community and multiplayer features provide endless opportunities for camaraderie and competition. Teaming up with friends or facing off against other players in epic battles is an absolute joy.

In summary, Souls Spectrum Awakening is a true gem that exceeds all expectations. It's a must-have for any gamer looking for an unforgettable adventure. With its stunning visuals, thrilling gameplay, and immersive storytelling, this game has set a new standard for the industry. Don't miss out on this gaming masterpiece!

It creates atmosphere and complements the visual experience, making every moment of the game unforgettable.

The customization options for the characters are extensive, allowing for a truly personalized gaming experience. Overall, "Soul's Spectrum: Awakening" delivers an exceptional gaming experience that I highly recommend to all adventure and RPG enthusiasts
